name: I need water!
description:
Controls:

Use Arrows and Space or Mouse to move the character and interact with environment.

Authors:
  • Graphics: Afi_Olya, zadanje7 AT yandex DOT ru.
  • Level Design/Dialogs: Odronin, odronin AT gmail DOT com.
  • Scripting: retrome, alexander.retro AT gmail DOT com.
  • Game Design/Testing: together.
Assets used:
  1. RPG Maker MZ default assets.
  2. Alternative menu screen layout plugin by Yoji Ojima
  3. Actor Hud plugin by Moghunter.
  4. Google Analytics plugin by Brian Rosamilia.
Game made using RPG Maker MZ for Low Effort Jam 8.
